    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteContainer

        public SpriteContainer(WorldManager world,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 size,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType type,
                       java.lang.String spritePath)
        Construct a sprite with a body
        Parameters:
        world - world to be created in
        position - position of the body
        size - size of the body (e.g. [32, 64])
        type - type of body - static, dynamic, or kinematic
        spritePath - path to the sprite .pack file or static .png

      • SpriteContainer

        public SpriteContainer(WorldManager world,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 size,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType type,
                       float density,
                       boolean passThrough,
                       java.lang.String spritePath)
        Construct a sprite with a body and more parameters
        Parameters:
        world - world to be created in
        position - position of the body
        size - size of the body (e.g. [32, 64])
        type - type of body - static, dynamic, or kinematic
        density - density of body
        passThrough - whether the sprite can detect collisions but doesnt interact with them
        spritePath - path to the sprite .pack file or static .png
